description: The Cloudmont Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Cloudmont for the snow report
Alexa, ask Cloudmont Mountain for latest conditions
name: Snow Report for Cloudmont
shortDescription: The Cloudmont Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Cloudmont.
